1: We raise joyful voices to our steadfast source of help.
2: We express gratitude with joyful songs
3: The supreme ruler reigns over all powers.
4: All depths and heights stand secure in sustaining hands.
5: One creative power shapes sea and land
6: We worship our maker with humble hearts
7: I listen today and flourish as part of a nurtured community.
8: I keep a tender, responsive heart.
9: Seeing reliable works deepens trust and gratitude
10: Keep your heart true and learn the right ways.
11: I trust and enter peaceful rest.
